column4: I just upgraded to dapper kernel(2.6.15-12-powerpc), I have problem on using bcm43xx module on ibook.
Seems it can't load the firmware correctly..
I did fwcutter and put *.fw files into /lib/firmware
but after ifconfig eth1 up, the dmesg told me: bcm43xx: Error: Microcode "bcm43xx_microcode5.fw" not available to load failed.
did you extract them correctly? the forums page on that has pretty detailed explanation
I think I did, I got an old version of ap driver from osx 10.3
I got no error with fwcutter.
i got the firmware from someguy who linked to it, but it worked the first time for me
i mean right on the first attempt
Maybe I should try the linked firmware too, where is the link?
it's somewhere on the thread, just search that thread for link
BTW, didn't you get error when using fwcutter with the linked driver?
i think that's the firmware itself
no, lemme pull up what i did
